q: In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.'' Michael Copps said, The Comcast-NBCU joint venture opens the door to the cable-ization of the open Internet. The potential for walled gardens, tollbooths, content prioritization, access fees... and a stake in the heart of independent content production is now very real.
